attributes.action: Stop the closure of the east of England showground and Peterborough speedway
attributes.additional_details:
Help stop the change of use to residential,  removing a site that has a vast history of hosting events for the public.
Stop the loss of the speedway track which has a great history of winning championships
It would be a loss to the city, exhibition company's and damage the sport of speedway in the uk
attributes.background:
Help stop the closure of the east of England showground and speedway track instead of turning it in to a residential development.
Speedway and events hosted at the showground brings in entertainment and investment to the city

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about the East of England Showground are a matter for the Agricultural Society, not the UK Government or Parliament.
